title: Twist Grip Position Sensor - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
From VIN AG1638 the routing of the handle bar harnesses has changed.
When installing the twist grip position sensor on models built before AG1638, route the handlebar harnesses as described in see
For models built before AG1638, the routing for the left hand switch housing harnesses must also be changed to the new routing as described in
Twist Grip Position Sensor - Removal - PB1
Note the routing of the twist grip harness for installation.
Detach the twist grip position sensor electrical connector from the front subframe.
Disconnect the twist grip position sensor from the main harness.
Twist grip position sensor electrical connector (main harness side)
Twist grip position sensor electrical connector tab
Feed the twist grip position sensor cable through the opening in the front subframe.
Note the routing of the harnesses around the right hand side of the upper yoke for installation.
Noting its orientation, remove the rubber band from the cables on the right hand side of the upper yoke.
Note the orientation of the twist grip position sensor for installation.
Slide the twist grip position sensor off the handlebar.
Twist Grip Position Sensor - Removal - From VIN AG1638
Note the routing of the twist grip harness for installation.
Detach the twist grip position sensor electrical connector from the front subframe.
Disconnect the twist grip position sensor from the main harness.
Twist grip position sensor electrical connector (main harness side)
Twist grip position sensor electrical connector tab
Feed the twist grip position sensor cable through the opening in the front subframe.
Note the routing of the harnesses around the brake master cylinder union bolt and the right hand side of the upper yoke for installation.
Remove the rubber band securing the harnesses to the handlebar.
Remove the cable tie securing the twist grip position sensor cable to the switch housing cables.

body.name: Secure harnesses RH switch housing clcn

body.body: Note the orientation of the twist grip position sensor for installation.
Slide the twist grip position sensor off the handlebar.
